display_long_description:
Transform Your Home Into the Ultimate Battlefield!

Take on cyborgs, soldiers, robots, and drones in a fast-paced, action-packed adventure. Choose your game mode, survive the clock to unlock new difficulties, and progress through thrilling missions to uncover hidden power-ups and weapons. Defend your play area right in your own home—all created by a solo developer!

Features:
Mixed Reality Magic: Seamless boundary removal and full multi-room support powered by Meta's room scan. Connect rooms using doors for an immersive experience.
Dynamic Gameplay: Your experience evolves with the quality of your room scans and how well you map your environment.

Supported Devices:
Built for Quest 3, Quest 3S, Quest 2, and Pro headsets.
Ensure your headset settings are correct, and the software is up to date. For Quest 3 and Quest 3S, take advantage of advanced scanning capabilities, 

Setup Assistance:
Need help with setup? Join our Discord via the company website for fast support:  https://discord.gg/53d4NQnDE9

Important Notes:
Quest 1 is not supported.
If you encounter tracking or performance issues like scene shifting or limited visibility, restart your headset and delete Guardian history through the settings menu. Rescan your space for the best results. These issues stem from the headset, not the app.

Single player for now!

Stay Tuned for More Content!
If you’re enjoying the app, please leave a review/rating , it helps me know to continue to support the game with new content including perhaps multiplayer.
